review: I have one of the first ROKU's and of course has a little problems. Since all my "toys' are from Apple, I decided to try the Apple TV. The setup instruction is not clear, but going on the internet to the Apple site, there you can get all the missing details.The unit works absolutely fine and since we are fluent in several languages, we can watch not only movies but most of the foreign TV stations. We don't have to see the tinted US news of course.I'm sure if Apple comes with a new unit in the future, even so I don't know what they can do better, I'm sure I will buy it.
